import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ModuleListing = () => { const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) const [viewOpen, setView] = useState(false) const [editOpen, setEdit] = useState(false) const [deleteOpen, setDelete] = useState(false) const [moduleData, setModuleData] = useState({ moduleName: '', moduleDiscription: '' }) const [editModule, setEditModule] = useState({ moduleName: '', moduleDiscription: '' }) const [error, setError] = useState({ moduleName: '', moduleDiscription: '' }) const validate = (moduleData) => { let moduleError = {} let isvalid = false if (!moduleData.moduleName) { isvalid = true moduleError.moduleName = "Field is required." } if (!moduleData.moduleDiscription) { isvalid = true moduleError.moduleDiscription = "Field is required." } setError(moduleError) return isvalid } const onChangeModule = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setModuleData({ ...moduleData, [name]: value }) switch (name) { case "moduleName": value === '' ? setError({ ...error, moduleName: 'Field is required.' }) : setError({ ...error, moduleName: '' }); break; case "moduleDiscription": value === '' ? setError({ ...error, moduleDiscription: 'Field is required.' }) : setError({ ...error, moduleDiscription: '' }); break; } } const handleAddSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (validate(moduleData)) { } setModuleData(moduleData) } const handleEditSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (validate(moduleData)) { } setEditModule({ ...moduleData }) } const onChangeEdit = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setModuleData({ ...moduleData, [name]: value }) console.log(moduleData, "moduleData"); switch (name) { case "moduleName": value === '' ? setError({ ...error, moduleName: 'Field is required.' }) : setError({ ...error, moduleName: '' }); break; case "moduleDiscription": value === '' ? setError({ ...error, moduleDiscription: 'Field is required.' }) : setError({ ...error, moduleDiscription: '' }); break; } } const handleDelete = () => { setModuleData('') console.log(moduleData, "empty"); } const toggleOpen = () => { setOpen(true) } const toggleViewOpen = () => { setView(true) } const toggleEditOpen = () => { setEdit(true) } const toggleDeleteOpen = () => { setDelete(true) } useEffect(() => { }, []) return ( <>

) } export default ModuleListing;
